trans-unit.source: Guidelines for background tasks
trans-unit.target: Guidelines for background tasks

trans-unit.source: Ensure your app meets the requirements for running background tasks.
trans-unit.target: Ensure your app meets the requirements for running background tasks.

trans-unit.source: Guidelines for background tasks
trans-unit.target: Guidelines for background tasks

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Ensure your app meets the requirements for running background tasks.
trans-unit.target: Ensure your app meets the requirements for running background tasks.

trans-unit.source: Background task guidance
trans-unit.target: Background task guidance

trans-unit.source: Consider the following guidance when developing your background task, and before publishing your app.
trans-unit.target: Consider the following guidance when developing your background task, and before publishing your app.

trans-unit.source: **CPU quotas: **Background tasks are limited by the amount of wall-clock usage time they get based on trigger type.
trans-unit.target: **CPU quotas: **Background tasks are limited by the amount of wall-clock usage time they get based on trigger type.

trans-unit.source: Most triggers are limited to 30 seconds of wall-clock usage, while some have the ability to run up to 10 minutes in order to complete intensive tasks.
trans-unit.target: Most triggers are limited to 30 seconds of wall-clock usage, while some have the ability to run up to 10 minutes in order to complete intensive tasks.

trans-unit.source: Background tasks should be lightweight to save battery life and provide a better user experience for foreground apps.
trans-unit.target: Background tasks should be lightweight to save battery life and provide a better user experience for foreground apps.

trans-unit.source: See [Support your app with background tasks](support-your-app-with-background-tasks.md) for the resource constraints applied to background tasks.
trans-unit.target: See [Support your app with background tasks](support-your-app-with-background-tasks.md) for the resource constraints applied to background tasks.

trans-unit.source: **Manage background tasks: **Your app should get a list of registered background tasks, register for progress and completion handlers, and handle those events appropriately.
trans-unit.target: **Manage background tasks: **Your app should get a list of registered background tasks, register for progress and completion handlers, and handle those events appropriately.

trans-unit.source: Your background task classes should report progress, cancellation, and completion.
trans-unit.target: Your background task classes should report progress, cancellation, and completion.

trans-unit.source: For more info see [Handle a cancelled background task](handle-a-cancelled-background-task.md), and [Monitor background task progress and completion](monitor-background-task-progress-and-completion.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info see [Handle a cancelled background task](handle-a-cancelled-background-task.md), and [Monitor background task progress and completion](monitor-background-task-progress-and-completion.md).

trans-unit.source: **Use [**BackgroundTaskDeferral**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700499): **If your background task class runs asynchronous code, make sure to use deferrals.
trans-unit.target: **Use [**BackgroundTaskDeferral**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700499): **If your background task class runs asynchronous code, make sure to use deferrals.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise your background task may be terminated prematurely when the [Run](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.applicationmodel.background.ibackgroundtask.run.aspx) method completes.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise your background task may be terminated prematurely when the [Run](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.applicationmodel.background.ibackgroundtask.run.aspx) method completes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Create and register a background task](create-and-register-a-background-task.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Create and register a background task](create-and-register-a-background-task.md).

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, request one deferral, and use **async/await** to complete asynchronous method calls.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, request one deferral, and use **async/await** to complete asynchronous method calls.

trans-unit.source: Close the deferral after the **await** method calls.
trans-unit.target: Close the deferral after the **await** method calls.

trans-unit.source: **Update the app manifest: **Declare each background task in the application manifest, along with the type of triggers it is used with.
trans-unit.target: **Update the app manifest: **Declare each background task in the application manifest, along with the type of triggers it is used with.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise your app will not be able to register the background task at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise your app will not be able to register the background task at runtime.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Declare background tasks in the application manifest](declare-background-tasks-in-the-application-manifest.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Declare background tasks in the application manifest](declare-background-tasks-in-the-application-manifest.md).

trans-unit.source: **Prepare for app updates: **If your app will be updated, create and register a **ServicingComplete** background task (see [**SystemTriggerType**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224839)) to help perform app updates that may be necessary outside the context of running in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: **Prepare for app updates: **If your app will be updated, create and register a **ServicingComplete** background task (see [**SystemTriggerType**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224839)) to help perform app updates that may be necessary outside the context of running in the foreground.

trans-unit.source: Request to execute background tasks:
trans-unit.target: Request to execute background tasks:

trans-unit.source: **Important** Starting in Windows 10, apps are no longer required to be on the lock screen in order to run background tasks.
trans-unit.target: **Important** Starting in Windows 10, apps are no longer required to be on the lock screen in order to run background tasks.

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps can run all supported task types without being pinned to the lock screen.
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps can run all supported task types without being pinned to the lock screen.

trans-unit.source: However, apps must call [**RequestAccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700485) before registering any type of background task.
trans-unit.target: However, apps must call [**RequestAccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700485) before registering any type of background task.

trans-unit.source: This method will return [**BackgroundAccessStatus.Denied**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700439) if the user has explicitly denied background task permissions for your app in the device's settings.
trans-unit.target: This method will return [**BackgroundAccessStatus.Denied**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700439) if the user has explicitly denied background task permissions for your app in the device's settings.

trans-unit.source: Background task checklist
trans-unit.target: Background task checklist

trans-unit.source: The following checklist applies to all background tasks.
trans-unit.target: The following checklist applies to all background tasks.

trans-unit.source: Associate your background task with the correct trigger.
trans-unit.target: Associate your background task with the correct trigger.

trans-unit.source: Add conditions to help ensure your background task runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: Add conditions to help ensure your background task runs successfully.

trans-unit.source: Handle background task progress, completion, and cancellation.
trans-unit.target: Handle background task progress, completion, and cancellation.

trans-unit.source: Do not display UI other than toasts, tiles, and badge updates from the background task.
trans-unit.target: Do not display UI other than toasts, tiles, and badge updates from the background task.

trans-unit.source: In the [Run](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.applicationmodel.background.ibackgroundtask.run.aspx) method, request deferrals for each asynchronous method call, and close them when the method is done.
trans-unit.target: In the [Run](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.applicationmodel.background.ibackgroundtask.run.aspx) method, request deferrals for each asynchronous method call, and close them when the method is done.

trans-unit.source: Or, use one deferral with **async/await**.
trans-unit.target: Or, use one deferral with **async/await**.

trans-unit.source: Use persistent storage to share data between the background task and the app.
trans-unit.target: Use persistent storage to share data between the background task and the app.

trans-unit.source: Declare each background task in the application manifest, along with the type of triggers it is used with.
trans-unit.target: Declare each background task in the application manifest, along with the type of triggers it is used with.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the entry point and trigger types are correct.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the entry point and trigger types are correct.

trans-unit.source: Write background tasks that are short-lived.
trans-unit.target: Write background tasks that are short-lived.

trans-unit.source: Background tasks are limited to 30 seconds of wall-clock usage.
trans-unit.target: Background tasks are limited to 30 seconds of wall-clock usage.

trans-unit.source: Do not rely on user interaction in background tasks.
trans-unit.target: Do not rely on user interaction in background tasks.

trans-unit.source: Re-register your background tasks during app launch.
trans-unit.target: Re-register your background tasks during app launch.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that they are registered the first time the app is launched.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that they are registered the first time the app is launched.

trans-unit.source: It also provides a way to detect whether the user has disabled your app's background execution capabilities (in the event registration fails).
trans-unit.target: It also provides a way to detect whether the user has disabled your app's background execution capabilities (in the event registration fails).

trans-unit.source: Do not specify an Executable element in the manifest unless you are using a trigger that should be run in the same context as the app (such as the [**ControlChannelTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701032)).
trans-unit.target: Do not specify an Executable element in the manifest unless you are using a trigger that should be run in the same context as the app (such as the [**ControlChannelTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701032)).

trans-unit.source: Check for background task registration errors.
trans-unit.target: Check for background task registration errors.

trans-unit.source: If appropriate, attempt to register the background task again with different parameter values.
trans-unit.target: If appropriate, attempt to register the background task again with different parameter values.

trans-unit.source: For all device families except desktop, if the device becomes low on memory, background tasks may be terminated.
trans-unit.target: For all device families except desktop, if the device becomes low on memory, background tasks may be terminated.

trans-unit.source: If an out of memory exception is not surfaced, or the app does not handle it, then the background task will be terminated without warning and without raising the OnCanceled event.
trans-unit.target: If an out of memory exception is not surfaced, or the app does not handle it, then the background task will be terminated without warning and without raising the OnCanceled event.

trans-unit.source: This helps to ensure the user experience of the app in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: This helps to ensure the user experience of the app in the foreground.

trans-unit.source: Your background task should be designed to handle this scenario.
trans-unit.target: Your background task should be designed to handle this scenario.

trans-unit.source: Windows: Background task checklist for lock screen-capable apps
trans-unit.target: Windows: Background task checklist for lock screen-capable apps

trans-unit.source: Follow this guidance when developing background tasks for apps that are capable of being on the lock screen.
trans-unit.target: Follow this guidance when developing background tasks for apps that are capable of being on the lock screen.

trans-unit.source: Follow the guidance in [Guidelines and checklist for lock screen tiles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465403).
trans-unit.target: Follow the guidance in [Guidelines and checklist for lock screen tiles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465403).

trans-unit.source: Make sure your app needs to be on the lock screen before developing it as lock screen-capable.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your app needs to be on the lock screen before developing it as lock screen-capable.

trans-unit.source: For more info see [Lock screen overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh779720).
trans-unit.target: For more info see [Lock screen overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh779720).

trans-unit.source: Make sure your app will still work without being on the lock screen.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your app will still work without being on the lock screen.

trans-unit.source: Include a background task registered with [**PushNotificationTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700543), [**ControlChannelTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701032), or [**TimeTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224843) and declare it in the app manifest.
trans-unit.target: Include a background task registered with [**PushNotificationTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700543), [**ControlChannelTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh701032), or [**TimeTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224843) and declare it in the app manifest.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the entry point and trigger types are correct.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the entry point and trigger types are correct.

trans-unit.source: This is required for certification, and enables the user to place the app on the lock screen.
trans-unit.target: This is required for certification, and enables the user to place the app on the lock screen.

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Note

trans-unit.source: This article is for Windows 10 developers writing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: This article is for Windows 10 developers writing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: If you’re developing for Windows 8.x or Windows Phone 8.x, see the [archived documentation](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132).
trans-unit.target: If you’re developing for Windows 8.x or Windows Phone 8.x, see the [archived documentation](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132).
